definition: A term commonly employed to refer to various types or varieties of a particular food item, specifically pertaining to the edible flesh of animals. It is typically used to categorize and differentiate between different kinds of this food product.

examples.english: What types of meat are there?

examples.german: Die Metzgerei hat eine gro√üe Auswahl an Fleischsorten.
examples.english: The butcher shop has a wide variety of meat types.
I don't eat exotic types of meat.

examples.german: In Deutschland sind Rind- und Schweinefleisch die beliebtesten Fleischsorten.
examples.english: In Germany, beef and pork are the most popular types of meat.

examples.german: Die Fleischsorte beeinflusst den Geschmack des Gerichts.
examples.english: The type of meat influences the taste of the dish.
